docs.snippet: Many Americans view Islam unfavorably, and supporters of Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump are more than twice as likely to view the religion negatively as those backing Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton, according to ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Many Americans view Islam unfavorably, and supporters of Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump are more than twice as likely to view the religion negatively as those backing Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton, according to a Reuters/Ipsos online poll of more than 7,000 Americans.

headline.main: Republicans, Democrats Sharply Divided Over Muslims in America: Reuters/Ipsos Poll
headline.print_headline: Republicans, Democrats Sharply Divided Over Muslims in America: Reuters/Ipsos Poll
